en-US.Lbl_Nom_City_Max_Length: City can have a maximum length of 40.
en-US.Title_Terms_msg2: no need for you to wait around!
en-US.Lbl_Terms_Wait_Around: Set up may take a few minutes... No need for you to wait around!
en-US.Lbl_Account_Created: Your Recurring Deposit has been set up
en-US.Lbl_Account_Success: Your account has been created successfully
en-US.Tenure_Deposit_Note1: Please enter the Account Number, installment Amount & Tenure before you click 'Submit'.
en-US.Tenure_Deposit_Note2: It is recommended to add a Nominee who is not an existing holder in the account.
en-US.Tenure_Deposit_Note3: Maturity Amount will be automatically credited to debit account on maturity date.
en-US.Tenure_Deposit_Note4: Minimum tenure for RD can be 6 months and in multiples of 3 months thereafter.
en-US.TC_Content1: Maturity amount is subject to change as TDS on interest shall be deducted (if any) as per the prevailing provisions of the Income Tax Act, 1961.
en-US.TC_Content2: In case of premature withdrawal before 30 days, no interest is payable.
en-US.TC_Content3: In case of premature withdrawal after 30 days and before 6mths, the interest rate that will apply for the entire amount will be the card rate applicable for 30-45 days.
en-US.Error_Nom_Address1_Max_Length: Address can have a maximum length of 40.
en-US.Error_Address_Special_Characters: Special charaters dot,underscore,minus sign and forward slash allowed.
en-US.Error_Guardian_Name_Max_Length: Guardian Name can have a maximum length of 40.
en-US.Error_NomineeName_Max_Length: Name can have a maximum length of 40.
en-US.Error_Years_Maxlength: Tenure(Years) can have maximum length of two digits.
en-US.Error_Amount_Minimum_Length: The amount must have a minimum length of 5.
en-US.Error_Amount_Minimum: The amount must be greater than 10000.
en-US.Error_Amount_Min_Req: Minimum Fixed Deposit Value is 10000 INR.
en-US.Error_Amount_Maximum: The amount must be less than 10000000
en-US.Error_AmtMax_Taxsaver: Tax Saver Maximum Deposit Amount is
en-US.Error_Days_Max1: That's too long ! Please set a duration shorter than
en-US.Error_Days_Min_1: That's too short! Please set a duration longer than
en-US.Error_Request_Cannot_Proceed: Request cannot proceed, pls contact customer care.!
en-US.Error_PAN_Consolidated_Amount: Ouch! That is more than is allowed without your PAN No. Please enter your PAN or call IDFC Bank.
en-US.Error_Amount_Available_Balance: You don't have that much money! Balance insufficient
en-US.Error_PAN_Not_Updated: Pan Number is not updated in the system.
en-US.tip_Rate_of_Interest: See the interest rate table to find the best rates and durations available
en-US.Lbl_NewSuccessMessage2: Your Recurring Deposit has been set successfully up.
en-US.Lbl_NewSuccessMessage3: The next debit for your Recurring Deposit will happen on :
